prompt:
Could you tell me about some notable literary works by American authors?
American literature has produced numerous classics that have had a profound impact on global culture. Some of these masterpieces include The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, To Kill a Mockingbird, Beloved, Invisible Man, and A Lesson Before Dying by Mark Twain, Harper Lee, Toni Morrison, Ralph Ellison, and Edward P. Jones respectively. Each novel has contributed significantly to literary discourse and has inspired countless writers and readers alike.
